summary.span: 表示列印系統硬體或軟體元件的 屬性 (及其值)。

span.span: Represents a property (and its value) of a printing system hardware or software component.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用這個類別來安裝不同的第二個印表機屬性與現有印表機只位置、 連接埠，以及共用的狀態。The following example shows how to use this class to install a second printer that differs in its properties from an existing printer only in location, port, and shared status. [!code-csharp[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/CSharp/Program.cs#cloneprinter)] [!code-vb[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/visualbasic/program.vb#cloneprinter)]

summary.span: 為指定的屬性初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `attributeName`拼字應該做為某些特定的名稱完全相同列印系統物件，包括大小寫的屬性。The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular property of a print system object, including casing. 例如，屬性物件必須拼字 「 傳送者 「 不 」 傳送者 」。For example, the property of a object must be spelled "Submitter", not "submitter".

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that has the specified value for the specified property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `attributeName`拼字應該做為某些特定的名稱完全相同列印系統物件，包括大小寫的屬性。The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular property of a print system object, including casing. 例如，屬性物件必須拼字 「 傳送者 「 不 」 傳送者 」。For example, the property of a object must be spelled "Submitter", not "submitter". ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用這個建構函式，若要安裝不同的第二個印表機屬性與現有印表機只位置、 連接埠，以及共用的狀態。The following example shows how to use this constructor to install a second printer that differs in its properties from an existing printer only in location, port, and shared status. [!code-csharp[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/CSharp/Program.cs#cloneprinter)] [!code-vb[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/visualbasic/program.vb#cloneprinter)]
